title: Frontend & Backend Development
description: Explore frontend and backend roles using restaurant analogies for clarity.

quiz.question: What does the frontend of an application represent?
In the restaurant analogy, what does the 'kitchen' represent in backend development?
Which frontend responsibility is similar to ensuring a burger tastes great regardless of where it's eaten?
In UX design, what does 'Information Architecture' correspond to in a restaurant?
What does 'Visual Hierarchy' in UI design relate to in the restaurant analogy?
options: Layering and presentation of the burger
quiz.answer: Layering and presentation of the burger

quiz.question: Which DevOps stage corresponds to setting up development environments in the restaurant analogy?
What does 'API Integration' in backend development relate to in the restaurant analogy?
In backend development, what is the purpose of 'Data Backup and Recovery'?
options: To store and manage user credentials
To ensure data can be restored in case of failure
quiz.answer: To ensure data can be restored in case of failure

quiz.question: Which concept involves making sure the application runs smoothly across various devices?
In UX design, what does 'Usability Testing' relate to in the restaurant context?
options: Checking the burger quality before serving
quiz.answer: Checking the burger quality before serving

quiz.question: What is the role of 'Authentication' in backend development?
options: Ensuring the app's design is consistent

quiz.question: Which frontend responsibility ensures that users have a positive experience regardless of their device?
In the restaurant analogy, what does 'Server-Side Logic' equate to in backend development?
What does 'Visual Design' in UI development focus on?
In backend development, what does 'Load Balancing' help achieve?
options: Distributing traffic to prevent server overload
quiz.answer: Distributing traffic to prevent server overload

quiz.question: What does 'Data Transformation' involve in backend processing?
options: Changing raw data into meaningful information
quiz.answer: Changing raw data into meaningful information

quiz.question: Which frontend aspect is analogous to ensuring a burger is visually appealing?
What does 'Error Handling' in backend development ensure?
options: That the user interface is consistent
That server errors are managed and the app remains stable
quiz.answer: That server errors are managed and the app remains stable
